dict.string: CaptureThis needs access to your microphone to provide real-time speech-to-text transcription and generate subtitles during screen recording.
CaptureThis needs access to your camera to record a selfie picture-in-picture alongside your screen recording.
CaptureThis uses speech recognition to generate real-time subtitles from your voice during screen recording.
CaptureThis needs to control other applications to temporarily hide and restore windows when selecting which window to record.
